Wrath: I'm sure we could find a good one. *Wrath begins walking trough the =
jungle looking around* Wrath: Maybe you should lead. I don't know these spo=
ts too well.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 11:06 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beas=
t Wars


  Inzola nods to Wrath and waits for Wrath to lead the way. Deemos=
 looked at Wrath.

  "You know, I used to hunt animals, but I had so many a=
nimal heads on my wall, I started hunting robots. Caught my fair share of M=
aximals and Predacons, I did! But the ones here are extra powerful, good ch=
allenge!" Deemos said to Wrath...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fro=
m: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, July 23, =
2000 10:50 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Wrath: Hmm...Sound good=
 to me! *Wrath says to Inzola*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      Fr=
om: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, July 23, 200=
0 9:05 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Deemos just stares at h=
im.

      "Wrath, we could go and find someone to slag." Inzola said...
  =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:44 PM
     =
   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        Wrath: I don't really know......Da=
mn... I never plan ahead! Hmm...I haven't been aound for to long...Hmm... *=
Wrath continues thinking of something to do*
          ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:19 AM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast =
Wars


          Deemos and Inzola walk to the jungle with Wrath.

        =
  "Who are we hunting?" Deemos asked...
            ----- Original Message =
----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
            Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:08 AM
            Subject: R=
e: Neo Beast Wars


            *Wrath begins walking for the jungle*
     =
         ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
       =
       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 =
5:02 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              "Yes, let=
's go." Inzola said to Wrath...
                ----- Original Message ----=
- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
                Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:53 AM
              =
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                Wrath: We could try jungle?=
 *Wrath asks Deemos*
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
            From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
            Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:39 AM
                  Subject=
: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  "It's up to you where we start." D=
eemos said to Wrath...
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
                  From: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
                    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:27 AM
       =
             Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    *Wrath nods =
and smiles* Wrath: Where should start? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
     =
                 ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: =
THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    =
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
                      Subject: Re: =
Neo Beast Wars


                      "Hunting? We hunted down almost ever=
yone already, but sure, we'll come." Inzola said.

                      "G=
ood to practice with our new beast modes." Deemos said. He patted Wrath on =
the shoulder.

                      "Those Alliance and Preds will be sorr=
y they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at Wrath.

       =
               "The Maximals, most of them just don't got it, but a few sta=
nd out, you are one of those few." Inzola said to Wrath...
                =
        ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: iloveal=
llizards 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
       Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
                        Subjec=
t: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                        *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well.=
.....We can go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had much to do...We go huntin=
g? *Wrath asks Deemos and Inzola*
                          ----- Original =
Message ----- 
                          From: THECODE 
                   =
       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Saturday, Ju=
ly 22, 2000 2:13 AM
                          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

=

                          Inzola smiles and shakes Wrath's hand.

        =
                  "Nice to meet such a charming and powerful bot upon my re=
pair." Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola hugged for about 5 seconds and then l=
ooked back to Wrath.

                          "So, what are we supposed t=
o do right now?" Deemos asked Wrath...
                            ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
                            From: ilovealllizards 
  =
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                         =
   Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:53 AM
                            Subje=
ct: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                            Wrath: I am Wrath and =
you must be the Inzola that Deemos spoke about. A pleasure to meet you. *Wr=
ath extends his hand for a hand shake*
                              ----- =
Original Message ----- 
                              From: THECODE 
      =
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                           =
   Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
                              Sub=
ject: Neo Beast Wars


                              Deemos looked at the C=
R Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

             =
                 "Maximal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deem=
os laughed.

                              "Who are you?" Inzola asked Wrat=
h.

                              Gangon's spark is still waiting.

       =
                       Artist runs around in a circle, playing his stupid g=
ames he believed exercises him. He runs away from the Maximal base and to a=
 mountain. He runs into the mountain and an avalanche starts, Artist is bur=
ried, various thoughts pass through his mind. Hours later, he awakes.

    =
                          "Oh, that was some blow, but I'll go with the flo=
w." Artist said.

                              "Plintissa? Where are you m=
y love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remembered that sh=
e was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were working, so he ran to P=
lintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

                             =
 "Plintissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist sai=
d. Plintissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laughed=
 and they kissed. After the kiss.

                              "Do me a f=
avor, Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

        =
                      "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have a good time! Oops!" =
Artist said. They both laughed and Artist took Plintissa to a grassy plain.=


                              Dracona held up her scanning device in fron=
t of Scorponok's face.

                              "I can find that devi=
ce I lost." Dracona said.

                              "Then I'll give it=
 to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blaster, it is an ice gun." Dracona s=
aid. She looked at Scorponok with big beautiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesis =
stared at her, mouths agape.

                              The Radicons sa=
t there still...
